tableList: Reasons to adopt Incoterms in Global Trade
The 3 Most Common Incoterms You Should Learn About
Incoterms related to Sea and Inland shipping

trade.heading: Reasons to adopt Incoterms in Global Trade
trade.subheading: Incoterms are essential in global trade for several reasons. They:
checklist: Provide a common language by establishing a shared understanding between buyers and sellers, enabling smooth communication and reducing.
Provide a common language by establishing a shared understanding between buyers and sellers, enabling smooth communication and reducing.
Provide a common language by establishing a shared understanding between buyers and sellers, enabling smooth communication and reducing.
Provide a common language by establishing a shared understanding between buyers and sellers, enabling smooth communication and reducing.
Provide a common language by establishing a shared understanding between buyers and sellers, enabling smooth communication and reducing.
trade.subTitle: EXW – Ex-Works or Ex-Warehouse
trade.description: EXW, or Ex-Works, is one of the most basic Incoterms. In an EXW agreement, the seller makes the goods available at their premises or another designated location. The buyer is responsible for all transportation costs, customs clearance, and assumes the risk from the moment the goods are handed over. The seller's obligation is fulfilled once the goods are made available.
